text: Luigi De Filippo (10 August 1930 – 31 March 2018) was an Italian actor, stage director and playwright. He was known for his movie role in Non è vero... ma ci credo, You're on Your Own, and in Love Italian Style. De Filippo died in Rome on 31 March 2018 of Alzheimer's disease at the age of 87. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1930 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian playwrights Category:Actors from Naples Category:Movie people from Naples
title: Luigi De Filippo
